creator: ddabkoski@salesforce.com
text:
After upgrading from 1.8.0 to 1.8.2 the ant property task spikes to 50s when using a 28MB properties file.

        <property file="SeeAttachedFilename.rmf"/>

property: finishedMon Nov 28 14:57:23 PST 2011 (50838ms).

In ant 1.8.0 it took subsecond time.

creator: ddabkoski@salesforce.com
text:
Oops.  The bad one was 1.8.0 not 1.8.2:

ddabkoski@ddabkoski-wsl:~/dev/build/automation/main/build$ ant -logger org.apache.tools.ant.listener.ProfileLogger -f myant.xml 
Buildfile: /home/ddabkoski/dev/build/automation/main/build/myant.xml

Target install: started Mon Nov 28 15:17:54 PST 2011

property: started Mon Nov 28 15:17:54 PST 2011

property: finishedMon Nov 28 15:17:56 PST 2011 (2074ms)

Target install: finishedMon Nov 28 15:17:56 PST 2011 (2079ms)
